forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain, some heavy early. High 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain, heavy at times early. High 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Periods of light rain early. Low 1C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly this evening. Low near 35F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 8C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 46F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain after midnight. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain developing after midnight. Low near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain late. High near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain late. High 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 34F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 5C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 41F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with overcast skies late. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 41F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low around 0C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 32F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low -2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 28F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
